DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the CTLM system when used adjunctively with mammography compared to mammography alone in the heterogeneously and extremely dense breast population.
DOC.brief_title: Computed Tomography Laser Mammography Breast Imaging Device
DOC.criteria: Female 21 and over Heterogeneously or extremely dense breast Schedule for biopsy Gave informed consent Mammogram not performed within the last 60 days Open lesions on the breast Previous breast biopsy within 60 days of the CTLM scan Surgical deformity of breasts Commercial Tattoos Protoporphyria Lactating
